title: New Cassiopeia skin?
body: Like seriously, when? e.e Hoping for a 950+ skin for her

replies.body: And still no skin :(     She should have a legendary skin !
I Want a new Cassio Skin. Im agree, we need a Legendary skin. Pls!! {{champion:69}}
It's been 7months and still no new skin. This is sad.
Riot has forgotten about her entirely. They didn't even care to fix the issues with her updated classic or Desperada skin despite the blatant differences between splashart and ingame model/texture.
What issues are you talking about? They smoothed everything out recently, didn't they?

> [{quoted}](name=Romans 8,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xN647IEj,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-09T17:13:28.827+0000)
>
> What issues are you talking about? They smoothed everything out recently, didn't they?

Look for yourself (see attached file).

It's even worse for the Desperada skin since they changed the snake species, her tail doesn't even resemble what's on the splashart to the least bit. 

There have been threads about this since the very beginning and they didn't respond to a single one of them. Also her hat has been downgraded aswell. The skin has lost its entire appeal since this visual gutting.
that kinda annoys me know that i noticed this. ugh why did u bring this to me attention now ima be annoyed whenever i play cass
Your only hope of escaping this predicament is to use one of her skins.
Yes pleas new cass skin , how about some  kind of acsended magical skin like xerath or something, or maybe a mecha or blood moon (think of the q)

I Want a new Cassio Skin. Im agree, we need a Legendary skin. Pls!{{champion:69}}  but plzzz must be epic like herrr  riot u make god skins  4 kata na temmo but cassio  u 4got her  so plzzzzzz make **murder casio ,championship casio ,victorios casssio  and one legendaryy  cassio** .is the best number 1{{champion:69}}

>950

That's not a skin tier >_>

But a new Cass skin would be something nice to see.

I've been playing Cassiopeia a lot recently, and would also appreciate some new skins. 
How about these ideas: Indian/Belly Dancer Cassiopeia, Polynesian/Hawaiian Cassiopeia?
